6fb1d32b-fef9-4c5f-9dac-884a530e861d.description: The AWS Innovate X Action badge recognizes AWS customers who have been accepted into, and have successfully completed the Innovate X Action accelerator program sponsored by AWS Innovation Programs team.
6fb1d32b-fef9-4c5f-9dac-884a530e861d.name: AWS Innovate X Action Participant

badge_template_activities.title: The receiver of the AWS Innovate X Action badge has participated to the innovation accelerator program led by the AWS Innovation Programs team. Learners have a thorough understanding of Amazon’s approach to innovation and Amazon’s Working Backwards mechanism, have attended the 1-2 days workshop, and have successfully submitted a first draft of a Press Release Frequently Asked Questions ( PRFAQ) document for their ideated solution.

250eaac2-362b-4dd0-9624-5a56c359c537.description: The AWS Innovation Scale Like Amazon badge is awarded to Startup Founders & Operators who have have learned about the mechanisms and principles of Amazon’s Culture of Innovation & Working Backwards.
250eaac2-362b-4dd0-9624-5a56c359c537.name: Scale Like Amazon

badge_template_activities.title: The receiver of the AWS Innovation Scale Like Amazon badge has participated in the Startup Founders & Operators learning series. Learners have a thorough understanding of Amazon’s approach to innovation, how to organize teams for rapid growth, how to establish a framework for high-velocity decision-making, an understanding of Amazon’s Working Backwards mechanism, and how to use communication and written narratives to build and scale.

64cd6417-dc76-4246-9a01-a9ec8f6f48c1.description: The AWS Innovate X Action Runner-Up Award recognizes AWS customers who have successfully completed the AWS accelerator program and whose ideated solution was awarded second place by the AWS Innovation Programs team.
64cd6417-dc76-4246-9a01-a9ec8f6f48c1.name: AWS Innovate X Action Runner-Up Award

badge_template_activities.title: The receiver of the AWS Innovate X Action Runner-Up badge has participated to the innovation accelerator program , and submitted the first draft of a Press Release Frequently Asked Questions ( PRFAQ) document for a solution that was selected as the runner-up idea by the AWS Innovation Programs team.

ae42d212-56da-4547-a495-f8f2172033f8.description: The AWS Innovate X Action Winner Award recognizes AWS customers who have successfully completed the AWS accelerator program and whose ideated solution was selected as the winning concept by the AWS Innovation Programs team.
ae42d212-56da-4547-a495-f8f2172033f8.name: AWS Innovate X Action- Winner Award

badge_template_activities.title: The receiver of the AWS Innovate X Action Winner badge has participated to the innovation accelerator program led by the AWS Innovation Programs team, and submitted the first draft of a Press Release Frequently Asked Questions ( PRFAQ) document for a solution that was selected as the winning idea.

c5b8b5e6-3107-4e2a-bc20-ec011de74b17.description: The AWS Innovation Leader award recognizes the exceptional leadership of AWS customers who have sponsored and led one or more Digital Innovation (DI) engagements led to new capabilities on AWS, and have adopted aspects of Amazon's mechanisms and organizational practices within their organization.
c5b8b5e6-3107-4e2a-bc20-ec011de74b17.name: AWS Innovation Leader

badge_template_activities.title: The receiver of AWS Innovation Award has sponsored and led at least one successful Digital Innovation engagement, defined as having produced a PR-FAQ and then a solution that is running on AWS. They are championing innovation within their organization inspired by their experience with AWS.
